greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{k>=1} sigma(k) * x^k / (1 - x^(2*k)), where sigma = A000203.
comment: Dirichlet convolution of A000027 with A001227.
mathematica: nmax = 62; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[DivisorSigma[1, k] x^k/(1 - x^(2 k)), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] // Rest
program: (PARI) a(n)={sumdiv(n, d, if(n/d%2, sigma(d)))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 13 2019
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 13 2019
